title: Sausage and ale casserole with mash
description: The sweetness of the muscovado sugar balances the bitterness of the beer. Serve with creamy mashed potatoes.
ingredients: 2 celery sticks, trimmed and thinly sliced
3 medium carrots, peeled and thickly sliced
2 medium leeks, trimmed and cut into 2cm/1in slices
1 tsp flaked sea salt, plus extra to season
